name: TV189
description: TV189 is an open-world horror game that is revolved around the TV189 infection.Mesmerize yourself in the dystopian cosmos of TV189, as you engage an alarming but possible future.Skirmish through the Russian Front Forces as you wrangle your way to your exit.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8 or 10 Processor: Dual Core 2Ghz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 670 / AMD Radeon 6000 Series Storage: 3 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compatiable Sound Card
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8 or 10 Processor: Intel i5 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1050Ti / AMD Radeon HD 7950 Storage: 3 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compatiable Sound Card
